caption: Citizen Soul has great employees serving their patrons. I have a wonderful story to tell about the hostess and the server Zack. These two gentlemen are as kind, compassionate as anyone would always wish to encounter. I praise their parents because they raised real men. I praise the restaurant for employing these two gentlemen. Thank you.

We went to celebrate and had a wonderful time! The staff was excellent and helped in selecting the perfect meal for us. It was a bit more expensive than our normal fare but well worth it. Strongly recommend anyone in the area give Citizen Soul a try
Brussel sprouts are my favorite! Great selection of wine. Was able to get a drink at the bar then move to our table for dinner. Great spot to hit on the weekend.

Hi we dinned in for our date night! Darius was our server and also working the bar he was very good!  Recommended Some items from the menu and we enjoyed the evening! We was very attentive and was overall a nice server. We enjoyed our food and our dessert! We will be coming back with our friends and family! Thanks for a great evening!
Love the duck fries, burger, and the gluten free fried chicken!
Place it's fine, friendly staff and it looks that are following COVID cautions. Food was great and tasty. We definitely would back.

The burger was amazing. Loved the bacon piece. & crispy fries, how can you not! First time here and we had our meal in one hour. We had to go to the bartender and ask him. Which he took great care of us after we nudged him. Thanks for that- which  I’m giving this place a 3 star. Food is amazing.l no doubt- And drinks were great. The mango drink was spicy. Must have bignett ! Anyway. Tip for the restaurant is to acknowledge everyone and greet them even when you’re  having a bad day. I think the staff looked mad or something was off. Maybe next time we will have a better time:🌹
Very nice small locally owned restaurant with incredible food and service. We hit the jackpot when we went there for dinner. Do try the gluten-free fried chicken, it’s excellent.
Meal and drinks are great!!!

Enjoyed a meal outside on the patio with heaters! Our waitress was attentive and personable. All the food was delicious. The field mignon was cooked perfectly and so flavorful. Highly recommend the stuffed peppers as an appetizer!
Great location with a nice room. The service was attentive and friendly. The food was above average and pricey for what it was.

I loved everything about Citizen Soul, from the ambiance to the service and the food. We had the cheese fritters and the soul burgers, to die for. I recommend this place for a chill Sunday brunch. We will come back again.
The pimento fritters are to die for!

Entrees are great - I got the short rib and it was delicious. Appetizers were a letdown (we got the burrata which wasn’t great) but the fried okra was good. Overall I bit pricey but a good sit down dinner spot with a good wine collection.
Went there Saturday great service very fast they do kind of give u the look if ur done leave but food was amazing and out service was a 10

Just left this place as happy as one could be! Drinks were delicious, food was fu-mazing and the service was most excellent!! I live almost an hour away and I will definitely be back ASAP and AMAP! Every bite, every sip and every smile was incredible!
Been here several times and have never been disappointed with what we've ordered. Great place to eat with outdoor seating.
Fantastic vibe, food and service

Ehh. The appetizers were the best part of our meal. The drinks were decent. As for our entrée the plates were very basic. Nothing special about the supposedly amazing braised beef short rib at all. I actually left over half of my dish as it was just not something that you would want to keep eating after a few bites. Overall a  very nice restaurant with ok food.
Food and service excellent

We had a very nice dinner with great service. Food was good but limited items on menu.However everything had good flavor. We were able to sit and socialize with nobody rushing you through your meal I will continue to eat here when in the neighborhood.
Good food. Great service. Awesome atmosphere
The Brussel sprouts were amazing and love the yam yam sauce

This is one of the best places we've been to in a while. Outside seating was awesome as it was on the opposite side of the building from the setting sun. The beer list was one of the best I've seen in a while. Better variety than "here's 10 hazy IPAs and bud light" The food was outstanding and portions were a good value. We'll definitely be back!
Third time dining at Citizen Soul. Always walk away full and happy. Recommend the Pimento Cheese Fritters as a yummy starter and the Angus Filet as a main. Great bar and attentive service.

Atmosphere is great!  We didn't plan ahead, so we sat at the bar for dinner.  Great, friendly service, and the food was delicious!  Perfectly prepare, beautifully presented, unique and delicious.  Will be back, for sure
Duck and scallops were amazing!! Awesome service!!
The food is sooooo great. I had the roasted red peppers soup, the duck with brussel sprouts and the soul burger with the fried pork belly. The kids had Mac & cheese which was wonderful
Delicious vegetarian options! Meat options were incredible as well. I’ve not had bacon like theirs anywhere else!

Recently dined at Citizen Soul.  Overall enjoyable experience. We started with an excellent Malbec wine.  However, there was a error on the bottle charged on the bill which the manager corrected.  Based on the waiter's suggestion, we had short rib peppers as an appetizer.  They were delicious.  Next was the grouper special for myself and my my enjoyed the salmon. My grouper was outstanding.  We finished with a lovely hazelnut chocolate mousse.  The waiter was attentive and had good insight.

Visited this location for Valentine's Day. It was my first time. I had heard good things about the restaurant previously. It wasn't what I expected but it was still a pleasant experience. I ordered there fried chicken which is served on grits and green beans. The grits was very flavorful. Enjoyed it very much. The chicken was cooked well but nothing to rave about. It was ok. My date had a burger and fries. He enjoyed the burger. The bar seemed to be popular but I didn't really look over there. It was a good experience but probably wouldn't eat there again.
Good place in downtown to have drinks and good food

Maybe they were having an off night...This will be the first and last time I go here.  I went on the recommendation of a friend.  She said the braised short ribs were amazing.  I got and so did my friend.  We both were so underwhelmed.  It was basically a piece of under seasoned pot roast for $28.00. We both substituted mashed potatoes for brussle sprouts, beyond burnt...We are not complainers...but we both came to the same conclusion having the same meal.  Super nice waiter and lovely place but not worth the cash...
Nice place, friendly staff, creative dishes, wine and beer list - not much left to wish for.
My favorite place in downtown Alpharetta. The price is great. Easy to make a reservation. Their duck dish is my favorite. Drinks are great! I will go there again and again!

All the food I tried there was amazing. I sat at the bar. The bartender was very nice and pleasant. He kept me entertained and made great suggestions for what to eat on the dinner menu. They also have a great wine selection to choose from.

Yum!!  Hubby and I tried this out of the blue based on a gluten free app recommendation, Find Me Gluten Free.  SO glad we did!  Not only is the setting wonderful being in the super cute downtown Alpharetta, but the food was phenomenal!  I had the gluten free fried chicken!!  So good!  We also had the duck fries - did not know that duck grease is healthier than others.  Didn't believe them either - but looked it up on Google and it's true!  And it makes the fries extra crispy - to die for!  Great chocolate GF cake for dessert too...not sure but it really tasted like Alpine Bakery :)  We will definitely be back!
Excellent food and service
Amazing food and the service was just as good. Don't miss the dessert
Great menu and cuisine. Service from Booker was phenomenal
Knowledgeable wait staff, with a comfortable and laid back atmosphere.
Amazing food and great staff!

The food was excellent - must try the cheese fritters and short ribs.  Our server, Jason A. was extremely courteous, professional and did whatever it took to make sure we were 100% satisfied.  Wish there were more servers like him.
Great food and nice atmosphere!
Very well-prepared dishes, excellent service. Really enjoyed the braised duck and pork tenderloin. Nice collection of craft beers and good selection of wines. Dining room is nice but not overdone.
Best Dining Experience 10 Stars Brandon was Fabulous Food was Amazing A Must Visit
I am gluten free and they have the best gluten free fried chicken!! Great service!

Amazing food and cocktails, waiter was very knowledgeable about what was gluten free and checked with the chef if he had any doubts. The fried chicken was amazing. We will definitely be back many times.

Like the atmosphere!  Server seemed a little stressed so she may have had more than she could handle. Never refilled my water.  Burger was okay..... Fried were too crunchy and barely warm.  This was lunch on a weekday.  I'll try them again but this first visit was just okay.
Food and waitress were excellent and price was fair.

Went here on 11/15/2019 for lunch with my parents. It was the first visit for all three of us. To say the experience was amazing would be an understatement. We dined around 3 o’clock during the bar bites menu time (in between) lunch and dinner service. We all shared the Pimento Fritters, Paquillu Peppers stuffed with Beef Short Rib, Garam Masala Cauliflower, Crab Kabocha Toast, and a slice of chocolate cake sourced from the local Alpine Bakery. Our servers name was Brandon, and he did an exceptional job explaining/describing each dish before we ordered. I would rate the Service a 10, Food a 10, Restaurant Cleanliness/Ambiance a 10, and Menu Variety gets a 10 as well. I’ve lived in this area for over three years, and I also work in the hospitality business. This place is perfect. Please don’t change a thing!
Excellent service!  Reasonable prices. Gluten free options that are delicious!
Delicious food and good service every time I’ve been. I’ve had the braised short ribs and fried chicken and both were superb. Brussel sprouts and pimento cheese balls... YUM. Highly recommend.
Meh. So-so. Burger was ok.
Great Customer service and food and drinks were on point . Thank You
Always great food & great fun at Citizen Soul!
Food was good but service was even better! Brandon the bartender was the best! He was so knowledgeable and accommodating. We will definitely go back.
Good food, pricey, but good.  Chef inspired dishes.
Classy place,classy food,classy prices.
Gluten free options...Yes!!!
Amazing staff and food. Fun place!
Nice decor . Fresh ingredients.. gf fried chicken was awesome Bottle  Wine list was pricey
Nice ambience.  Good food.  Food choice was a little limited but delicious..
Exceptional dished expertly prepared.  We sat at the bar and Darius was an amazing server.  We had the short ribs,  generous portion and melted in your mouth.  The batterless okra was amazing.
Great fresh salads like watermelon and peach arugula

Weekend menu was limited. Not my kind of food. Burger (2 patties) and fries were good but it was $14.00. Unless they had a kid menu or week menu is different, would not take kids. Also no sweetener for tea, no salt and pepper on table.

Citizen Soul was a delicious option for date night. My husband and I had been doing other activities in town and had already been snacking. We ordered the gluten free fried chicken entree and Napa Cabbage Salad to split. It was more than enough food for the two of us, and some of the best food I've ever tasted.  Their Fleur de lis cocktail was also out of this world for anyone who appreciates a botanically based gin cocktail. Service was amazing. They were busy but were able to seat us right away.  Their menu wasn't marked with what was allergen friendly and what wasn't, but their servers were very well versed in what the menu had and what was safe for me to order.  10/10 would visit again.
The flat bread has tangy artichokes and tomatoes that burst with flavor. Best ever and I would love to revisit to try out their drinks. Great vibes and service.

Great bar and cocktails with a terrific patio space. Food on menu has flavors of the South with a West Coast flare. Pimento Cheese Fritters were delicious.Cardamanhattan, Lavender Lemonade and Smoked Paloma were just a few of the great cocktails had by our group with still a few more interesting ones left to try. Service was great although, we were there around 4:30p on a Sunday afternoon.

We were sat in the bar area and the bartender that took care of us was awesome. He was attentive and paid close attention to our food order as we had food allergies. Food was good. The brussel sprouts side with pork belly was awesome. The gluten free fried chicken was very good.
Fun beer list, very good burger for 14, Ok steak for 30. Dog friendly patio seating is a big plus and the fans made a nice breeze. Fries were very crispy and came with aioli sauce that we enjoyed.
Burger was really good. Interesting beer choices. I don’t usually drink but I like fruity beer which they had a few. Try samples before you order!
Food was good, but we sat outside and almost got eaten alive by various bugs. It kind of spoiled the evening.
Frist time there, great food and service.
Burger italian style fantastic
Service and food were wonderful!
Always a pleasure to eat here. Drinks are solid and the food is amazing.
Drinks were great but overpriced. Wasnt drawn to any of the entrees so we didnt stay for dinner.
Just went there for drinks and snacks. Made a hell of a margarita for us

We have been here three times. The staff & kitchen are always willing to let us order something, such as grilled chicken that's not on the menu. They have been very accommodating. Servers have been so nice & attentive. Food has been excellent. Back patio is covered with fans, so it's nice even on hot days. Outdoor seating very comfortable. Great place for a drink at night.
Order the avocado crab toast and scallops special entree...great food, imaginative drinks..service was a bit spotty but overall a good experience.

Great food and great service.  At Citizen Soul you get the full package: knowledgeable professional wait staff who actually know the menu and the way dishes are made AND entrées that are original and freshly made of quality ingredients.  I really enjoyed the scallops.  You only get 3 but it is plenty unless you are starving.  I also recommend the brussels sprouts as a side dish; they are delightfully sauteed with pork belly and sweet onions but they are not oily at all.  The flatbreads are made from scratch, it is a traditional crust, and it is very nicely topped with quality ingredients.  The flatbread on the kids menu is an unbeatable value that would almost satisfy an adult appetite... It is actually the same size as the regular flatbreads but with cheese only.

Very disappointed in the food.  Service was fantastic but the entree was terrible.  3 of us ordered the steak and none of us got anything close to it being done.  I ordered mine medium well and it arrived seared on the outside, bleeding on the inside.  Clearly it was cooked rare so the server kindly returned it to the kitchen for me.  It came back exactly the same.  I stomached through it because I was hungry and it cost $30.  I won’t go back and would highly recommend spending your money elsewhere.  On the positive side, our server was great! And the appetizers and dessert were delicious.

Nice vibe... Didn't like brussel sprouts, very flavorless.  Needs more fat & acid.  Loved the fried chicken dish & husband's burger & fries were great!  The servers were very interested in our opinions & feedback which was nice.  Will  come back for sure.

Good service. The place was clean and the area was booming for lunch. I like the healthy menu and want to go back later for drinks. Food is seasoned well which is why they don't have salt and pepper on the tables. My vegan bowl was good. Fresh ingredients. My colleague thoroughly enjoyed the burger, which the server said was very popular. I'll get the bourbon chicken when I return!

The service was very good...lots of people filling up our water glasses...It was a bit pricey.  The charred brussel sprouts were quite charred.  The fried chicken was juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside...just right. The green beans and grits that came with the chicken were tasty.
Service was great but more of a drinking restaurant rather then a place to dine out
Great food and ambiance

Absolutely fantastic! Everything from the sweet tea to the cocktail the children's Mac and cheese the appetizer and the entrees were perfect, flavorful and cooked perfectly. If you can't decide just go with the fried chicken and thank me later! This place made  mother's day for my wife and mother perfect

First time at Citizen Soul to celebrate our anniversary, was excited to try the food and atmosphere that is now Alpharetta on a Friday night. Reservation made on google, efficiently processed. Arrive 10 mins early and seated immediately, restaurant had a good vibe. 3 people seated and ordered 2 starters to share and 3 mains. No offer of wine, glasses were just removed from table. Complimentary water served. Drinks order brought the table all separately, soft drinks left on table no glasses, had to ask for them. Starters arrived but only 1, again we had to call server back and surprised she said she didn’t put order in!!! Again had to ask for plates for sharing starters. So 1 starter was finished before salad arrived. What’s the point, the salad while good was lacking on the subtle veggie/bacon ingredients. 3 mains arrived again separately, dining is about everyone getting their meal at the same time and it wasn’t that there were not enough people or bussers around to help deliver food. We were offered the desert menu said yes but server brought the bill!! Again we asked for the menu. At this stage we decided to pass and order ice cream in another establishment. While reviewing Citizens menu and finishing our drinks we completed the bill and chatted. The server was eager to get the bill off the table and by now we said a strong NO to be left to finish our drinks. Never have I had a service that was so inconsistent, she was just not clued in and did not give the impression that she was new in anyway. Overall, not excited to come back, food good, service poor, value for money below average in comparison to other eateries in Main Street and Avalon. Disappointed all round. Lacking Soul.

Very cool restaurant with a nice menu and tasty food. Ate lunch on the large patio which made for some great ambience on a beautiful day. This location brings out the promise of the development in Alpharetta city center. The lobster salad was fantastic.  What could have been an excellent experience was destroyed by abysmal service. Our server was slow to take our order, gracially slow to bring our check, didn't handle the split checks the way we requested, and then abandoned our table completely. At the end we had to scrounge up cash to leave at the table so we could get out of there, and that was after what turned into an over 90 minute lunch.  Won't be returning.
Pimento Cheese Bites were very good and the Gluten Free Fried chicken was so tender, juicy and delicious.
One of the best restaurants in Alpharetta.great food and wine selection

We had a terrific time sitting outside on the pet friendly patio. Food was great, service was superb. Our server, Callie, could no have been more accommodating. Prepare for disappointment when ordering beer, the glasses are tiny.

Citizen Soul is absolute perfection from top to bottom. Beautiful restaurant, gorgeous food presentation, solid dishes Every. Damn. Time., and fantastic service. It’s quickly become one of our “go to” spots to take out-of-company. I’ve never been even the slightest bit disappointed!
Very delicious food! The service was great and the drinks were awesome:)

I came with a group of friends and we loved it! The food was amazing! For appetizer we had the pork chicharrones which was delicious and for the main course I had the GF fried chicken and it was the best fried chicken I have ever had! The food is a little pricey as expected but certainly worth it! I will have to say we ordered a round of this pictured pink drink and we did not like it, it tasted just like cough syrup but upon mentioning it to our server he offered to get us something else, which we did... again, excellent service.

Great atmosphere and great food!  The gluten-free fried chicken was sensational! I would highly recommend, specially for a date night or night out with a few friends.  My only negative feed back is that the drinks were too sweet but that is a personal taste.  The food on the other hand was top notch.  Service was excellent as well.
First time... menu is interesting in a good way.  Service was excellent.  Good beer and wine selections.  Everything that came out was beautifully presented as and tasted great.  Thumbs up for sure

Really creative and amazing food!  Friends and I started with the cheese board and had the scallops, fried chicken and hamburger for our entrees.  None were run of the mill.  All was crazy delicious.  Comfortable atmosphere and great service.  Highly recommend!

Elegant, clean, and relaxing atmosphere. Professional and friendly service. The food quality is outstanding! So very FRESH, healthy and delicious!!! The wine and liquor selection is great. I had the butter lettuce salad with herb dressing with added grilled chicken. The flavors were wonderful; chicken so tender and fresh; the bacon is amazing! Next time, I want to try the gluten free fried chicken!! I can't wait to go back. Excellent for lunch and dinner!!
Good food, very delicious, perfect cocktails and a large wine list
Wow food and drinks were amazing, liked everything we tried, portions are decent size and our waiter was on point

Just stopped in for a drink. Loved our bartender Adrian, friendly, knowledgeable. Nice selection of wines, beers and cocktails. It was a Monday night so noise level was nonexistent, not sure on a busier night. Has a nice patio but the pollen count has me seeking the indoors!
Cool atmosphere, tasty food, great customer service!
Had a Sazerac and McKenna 10yr BIB. Bartenders top notch

Today we went back to Citizen Soul in downtown Alpharetta during lunchtime, after two excellent dining experiences. As we always do, we took our own wine and understand the cork fee arrangement, but to our surprise the hostess informed us that we could not open our wine because it was available on the restaurant's wine list (Cross Barn by Paul Hobbs ). I promptly requested that they check if they had exactly the same harvest (2012), as I would be willing to pay for the wine and return with mine to my home if indeed they had the same wine we brought. Later it was confirmed by the waiter that they did not have this harvest and yet they did not allow us to open our wine. Without hesitation, we decided to get up and leave. I really hope that this episode will serve the manager / owner review the policy of the restaurant, because any layman knows that wines of the same label but different vintages are not equivalent. As a client, this experience may lead me to never return to this establishment. While we understand the rule (I.e.; only allow customers to bring in wines that are not on the restaurant’s wine list), and believe it is fair, they could have worked with us. The manager didn’t even come to the table to talk to us, she kept sending the waiter, who was understandably, a bit embarrassed. Some flexibility and common sense would’ve gone a long way. Att: PABLO VIEIRA
Great food.  Cool, chic environment.  Fun.

Stopped in Around 5ish Saturday night for our first time. The place was rather empty yet we were only able to get a bar table as we didn’t have a reservation. The host team (young & older gentleman) weren’t the friendliest. The atmosphere was great, our server was very nice, the beer selection and bar is definitely something I would return for. The food was so so, we ordered two chicken dishes, a burger, some Brussels and pork rinds. The restaurant was very clean.

Short rib was fantastic -- great flavor and so tender.  Served on a bed of potatoes with a delicious sauce which complimented rather than overwhelmed the meat.  Atmosphere is hip but warm and cozy and staff was super!  Attentive, friendly and fun.  Couldn't ask for anything more from the front of the house!
Very good food and quick service.
Good food. Bar a little pricey. Great location. Quite loud.

Update 2/26/19: I've been back to Citizen Soul several times and this place is amazing. Consistently great service and delicious food and drinks. I've enjoyed the charcuterie board, pimento cheese fritters, and the burger. The bartenders and servers are friendly and makes you feel welcomed. Their fire pit outside is the perfect way to end the evening.  Original review from December 2018: Really enjoyed this restaurant! Had reservations for dinner mid-week. There was a nice crowd and the restaurant was almost completely full and we were seated on time. The atmosphere and ambiance is warm and inviting. Service was great...friendly, attentive and, knowledgeable.  Nice small menu with unique options...not the normal everyday plates you see at most restaurants. The squash toast and salmon were amazing. I loved the peanut butter chocolates for dessert.  Will definitely be coming back. So glad to have this awesome restaurant added to our community.
Short effective menu. Nice smaller restaurant in downtown Alpharetta with a nice view.
Really awesome food, service was point on to! Very cool environment 👌, nice job I'll be back ASAP
Nice venue. Time to get our order was somewhat lagging. Food was ok.

The food was delicious and the ambiance was good. We had a reservation on a weekend night and were seated quickly. The service left a bit to be desired. Our server seemed to forget about us at times. All the tables around us received their drinks and apps before we did, even those tables who were both seated and ordered after we did.  Additionally we ordered the special (tomahawk steak) and were not warned of the $100 price tag. I appreciate that special dishes are offered but the staff should be mindful of a menu item costing 4x as much as all the other main dishes and give the customer a heads up so the bill isn’t a surprise. We were also told all the sides were “a la carte,” a nice way of saying your $100 steak comes with no sides.  The sommelier was friendly and introduced himself right away. Unfortunately our server hadn’t stopped by yet and we hadn’t ordered any food. It would be better if the sommelier stopped by after food had been ordered and could offer pairings. Or if the server had asked “are any of you interested in speaking without sommelier about wine pairings for you meal?” Instead of helping with wine selections, the sommelier seemed to spend most of his time running food and refilling water for the tables.
Great food (bacon app is a must!), drinks, and service. 2 hour wait by 6:15 Saturday night so reservations are a must unless you want to hunt for a spot at the bar. Cheers!
Great food and friendly staff

Went to Citizen Soul on a Tuesday night, figured low key, easy dinner, walked across the street in the 30 degree weather, stepped inside and watched the hostesses flirt with a man twice their age. Tried making eye contact so we could be seated and continued to be ignored. Eventually we just walked out and back in the cold. Would have loved to have tried the food but needed to be able to be seated to do so. Doubt I’ll be back due to the clientele that is being promoted. Hope customers are a priority to the owners of citizen soul.
Very friendly and welcoming. Great food. Limited menu but seasonal and a good selection to choose from.

The ambiance was great, as was the service, and the food was even better. The braised beef was delicious and the bok choy slaw that it came with may be one of my new favorites. Would definitely recommend the pimento cheese fritters as well!
Great food, atmosphere, and service!
Great burger and fries! Great service too!

I have been there twice and will make it a weekly visit as food is fresh innovative and delicious. And service tops that. You must try the kabocha toast. Extraordinary. Hate they are so popular now as I can’t get my Friday night reservation tonight. 🤣
Great food, service and ambience.
I don’t usually leave reviews, but I loved the soul burger so much I needed to. One of the best burgers I’ve had in a while. Service was great as well, 5 stars!

Service is impeccable. Wine list is concise but a good variety. Red wine comes out appropriately slightly chilled. The menu has some amazing things on it. The chiccharones come to the table still crackling. A little spice, a little vinegar and a little salt. I can't wait to try the braised short rib. Or the pimento cheese fritters.

First visit with the wife. We both loved the food and ambiance. This is a great addition to the area. HOWEVER, only one word of caution, if your a meat and cheese board lover as an app like myself. The meats and cheese are sold separately and you only find out when the bill comes. Could have use a bit of a heads up before paying a premium ($30) for both items that comes on the same board.
Great place to eat. Good service, good atmosphere, nice location. Menu is pretty limited but it is well prepared. Excellent wines. A great place for a family dinner or a date.

Alright, let me start this out by asking anyone reading this to look at any of my reviews. I will find something wrong. And believe it, I was TRYING. The food. Dank af. The service. 4-5 stars (my girl Candace did a great job btw management). The atmosphere. Pleasant. The drinks. Inspirational. Go here. Hope this place stays the way it is for a while! Somebody promote somebody!!

Citizen soul restaurant.. tagline is "Work Hard. Eat Well. Feed Your Soul." A Soul From The South With An Eye On The West. Inspired by pubs and taverns in Northern California, Oregon, and Washington. Citizen Soul is California cuisine with Southern heart and soul. Fine fare for the working man…and woman with simple, fresh ingredients. A West Coast style tavern in the heart of Alpharetta. HOURS Dinner Mon-Thu: 5p-10p Fri-Sat: 5p-11p Sun: 5-9p

We got the beef short rib, which was the highlight! The pimento cheese fritters came a close second. The flat bread was more like a pizza without the sauce! The wine list is great and the bathrooms are really nice! Giving it four stars because the other food items could have been better!

Our family had an amazing meal and celebration here. Food, dessert, wine, staff all five star. We will be back. We will eat more pimento fritters and creme brulee (among many other amazing items!). Thank you!
Incredible food, ambiance, staff, and liquor/beer/wine selection. I highly recommend the salmon and the short rib.
The food was outstanding and our waiter was fantastic. Great place!
Great Birthday dinner!
Great night of food and drinks. Service was great. Wonderful menu options. Everything was great. Must try pimento cheese appetizer.
